item.title: an error when using android emualtor in arch
item.description: Source: How to edit emulator flags in Android Studio DRI3 issues The hardware acceleration of the Android emulator can’t run with DRI3 in Linux, so we need to disable DRI3. I’ve been confused about this problem for a long time. Even though I saw its running log by using ADB and Android Studio, it couldn’t show any problems about this. It only shows errors. 1 2 3 4 5 X Error of failed request: GLXBadContext Major opcode of failed request: 155 (GLX) Minor opcode of failed request: 6 (X_GLXIsDirect) Serial number of failed request: 49 Current serial number in output stream: 48 Thanks to the blogger Mike’s hint, we only need to use LIBGL_DEBUG=verbose.

item.title: arch i3 configuration
item.description: 1 ArchLinux安装参考链接 ArchLinux Installation guide archlinux 简明指南 篝ノ雾枝的魔法学院 2 获取镜像列表 此方法写在.zshrc里，用命令行快捷进行替代。 1 2 3 #注意：在--sort rate中，有些镜像无法进行评分，会在命令行下弹出警号（WARNING） sudo reflector --country China --age 6 --latest 6 --fastest 6 --threads 6 --sort rate --protocol http --save /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist 镜像下好之后，删除tuna源(好几次下载失败，用的人太多了），用bfsu或opentuna等其他镜像源。 3 开发环境 3.1 Java Java Java-ArchWiki 1 2 3 sudo pacman -S java-runtime-common java-environment-common sudo pacman -S jdk8 #选择 extra/jdk8-openjdk/extra/jdk11-openjdk 使用 archlinux-java 命令来管理 Java 环境 列举 Java 环境： 1 archlinux-java status 选择 Java 环境：
